courses.title: JavaScript Basics
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript, the essential language for web development.

courses.title: TypeScript for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with TypeScript and learn how to build scalable applications.

courses.title: React.js Essentials
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of React.js to build dynamic user interfaces.

courses.title: Next.js for Production
courses.description: Dive into Next.js and discover how to create server-rendered React applications.

courses.title: State Management with Redux
courses.description: Master Redux and learn how to manage application state effectively in your React apps.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
courses.description: Explore advanced JavaScript topics, including closures, promises, and async programming.

courses.description: Learn to build powerful applications using React and TypeScript together.

courses.title: Next.js: Static and Dynamic Routing
courses.description: Understand how to implement both static and dynamic routing in Next.js applications.

courses.title: Testing React Applications
courses.description: Learn how to write tests for React applications using popular testing libraries.

courses.title: Redux Toolkit: Simplifying State Management
courses.description: Discover how Redux Toolkit simplifies state management in modern React applications.
